alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 7:15PM EDT until October 01 at 2:05PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Connecticut... Still River At Brookfield affecting Litchfield and Fairfield Counties. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Friday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.9 feet late tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Fri 6 pm: 13.7 Forecast: Sat 1 am 14.8 Sat 7 am 14.9 Sat 1 pm 14.6 Sat 7 pm 13.9 Sun 1 am 13.1 Sun 7 am 12.2 &&
